trans-unit.target: Ka bincika ko akwai sababbin abubuwa

trans-unit.source: Another copy of the application is already running. If you cannot find it, restart your computer.
trans-unit.target: Wani kofin wannan manhajar na kan gudana. Idan ba za ka iya samun shi ba, sai ka kashe sannan ka sake kunna na'urarka mai ƙwaƙwalwa.

trans-unit.source: Another copy of {0} is already running. If you cannot find that copy of {0}, restart your computer.
trans-unit.target: Wani kofin na {0} na kan gudana. Idan ba za ka iya samun kofin ba, sai ka kashe sannan ka sake kunna na'urarka mai ƙwaƙwalwa.

trans-unit.source: There was a problem starting the application which might require that you restart your computer.
trans-unit.target: Akwai wata 'yar matsala a wurin buɗe manhajar wadda mai yiwuwa za ka buƙaci ka kashe, sannan ka sake kunna na'urar ta ka.

trans-unit.source: There was a problem starting {0} which might require that you restart your computer.
trans-unit.target: A kwai wata 'yar matsala a wurin buɗewa {0} wadda me yiwuwu za ka buƙaci ka kashe na'urar ta ka sannan ka sake kunnawa.

trans-unit.source: Waiting for other application to finish...
trans-unit.target: Ana jiran sauran manhajar su gama...

trans-unit.source: {0} will be moved to the Recycle Bin.
trans-unit.note: Parameter {0} is a description of the things being deleted (e.g., "The selected files"

trans-unit.source: {0} will be moved to the Recycle Bin.
trans-unit.target: {0} za a jefa a kwandon shara.
Ka Tabbata kana so a share

trans-unit.source: Found {0} images with names close to {1}
trans-unit.target: An sami {0} hotuna masu sunaye kusa da {1}
trans-unit.note: The {0} will be replaced by the number of images found. The {1} will be replaced with the search string.
Used to copy a previous metadata set to the current image. The {0} will be replaced with the name of the exemplar image.

trans-unit.source: This is the 'Art Of Reading' gallery. In the box above, type what you are searching for, then press ENTER. You can type words in English and Indonesian.
trans-unit.target: Wannan shine zauren 'Fasahar Karatu'. A cikin akwatin da ke sama, ka rubuta abinda kake nema, sannan ka dangwala ENTER. Kana iya rubuta kalmomi a cikin harshen Ingilishi ko Indonisiya.

trans-unit.source: Sorry, something went wrong while getting the image.
trans-unit.target: Gafara dai, an ɗan sami 'yar matsala a lokacin da ake ƙoƙarin samun hoton.

trans-unit.source: Sorry, something went wrong with the ImageToolbox
trans-unit.target: Yi haƙuri, wani abu ya sami akwatin da hoton ya ke ciki

trans-unit.source: Install the Art Of Reading package (this may be very slow)
trans-unit.target: A Saka manhajar Fasahar Karatu (mai yiwuwa ya ɗan ɗauki lokaci)

trans-unit.note: The {0} will be replaced by the number of matching images

trans-unit.source: Did you know that there is a new version of this collection which lets you search in Arabic, Bengali, Chinese, English, French, Indonesian, Hindi, Portuguese, Spanish, Thai, or Swahili? It is free and available for downloading.
trans-unit.target: Ko ka san akwai wani sabon manhajar wanda zai ba ka damar bincike a cikin harshen Larabci, Bengali, Sinanci, Ingilishi, Farasanci, Indonsiyanci, Hindu, Potugis, Spaniyanci, Thai ko Suwahili? A kyauta, kuma zaka iya saukar da shi zuwa cikin taka na'urar.

trans-unit.source: This computer doesn't appear to have the 'Art Of Reading' gallery installed yet.
trans-unit.target: Da alama wannan na'urar ba ta da manhajar zauren Fasahar karatu tukunna.
Ba a samu hotunan da suka dace ba

trans-unit.note: Shown in the file-picking dialog to describe what kind of files the dialog is filtering for

trans-unit.source: Sorry, there was a problem loading that image.
trans-unit.target: Gafara dai, an samu matsala wajen jawo wancen hoton.

trans-unit.source:
This image does not know:

Who created it?
Who can use it?
trans-unit.target:
Wannan hoton bai san shi ba:

 ba Wa ya ƙirƙiro shi?
Wa zai iya amfani da shi?

trans-unit.source: Search the Art of Reading Gallery
The search box is currently set to {0}
trans-unit.target: A halin yanzu an saita akwatin binciken ya {0}

trans-unit.source: This list should include all the ISO-639 languages, including all the alternative names known to ethnologue.com.\n\nIf necessary, use the "Unlisted Language" option, which will be selected for you now.
trans-unit.target: Wannan jerin zai ƙunshi dukkan yarukan ISO-369, haɗe da dukkan sunayen da ethnologue.com ya sani.\n\n Idan ya zama dole, yi amfani da zaɓin "Yarurrukan da basu cikin jeri" waɗanda za a zaɓa maka yanzu.

trans-unit.note: It's ok to change what this shows; the underlying destination will remain ethnologue.com

trans-unit.source: About Language 639-3 Codes & How To Apply For New Ones
trans-unit.target: Game da Yaren 639-3 Codes da Yadda Za Ka Nemi Wasu Sabbi
Game da wurin yin Rajistar Yaren ISO

trans-unit.note: Shown when there are multiple countries and it is just confusing to list them all. {0} is a count of countries.

trans-unit.source: You can change how the language name will be displayed here:
trans-unit.target: Ka na iya canza yadda za a nuna sunan yaren a nan:
Yaren da ba shi a cikin jeri

trans-unit.source: Unfortunately, {0} is starting to get short of memory, and may soon slow down or experience other problems. We recommend that you quit and restart it when convenient.
trans-unit.target: Amma kash, {0} wurin ajiyar bayanai na na'urarka ya ragu sosai, kuma saurin ta na iya raguwa, haɗi da wasu matsaloli. Muna ba ka shawarar ka fita sannan ka kuma sake kunna ta a lokacin da ya dace.

trans-unit.source: You must keep the copyright and credits for authors, illustrators, etc.
trans-unit.target: Dole ne ka ajiye haƙƙin mallaka da kuma alaƙanta aiki ga marubuta, masu zayyana da sauran su.
trans-unit.note: See http://creativecommons.org/ to find out how this is normally translated in your language. What we're aiming for here is an easy to understand summary.

trans-unit.source: You are free to make commercial use of this work.
trans-unit.target: An yarda ka yi amfani da wannan aikin ta wajen harkar kasuwanci.
trans-unit.note: See http://creativecommons.org/ to find out how this is normally translated in your language. What we're aiming for here is an easy to understand summary.

trans-unit.source: You may adapt and add to this work.
trans-unit.target: Kana iya ɗaukar aikin nan a yadda ya ke ko ka yi ƙari akai.
trans-unit.note: See http://creativecommons.org/ to find out how this is normally translated in your language. What we're aiming for here is an easy to understand summary.

trans-unit.source: You may adapt and add to this work, but you may distribute the resulting work only under the same or similar license to this one.
trans-unit.target: Kana iya ɗaukar aikin nan a yadda ya ke, amma za ka iya rarraba sakamakonsa ta ƙarƙashin wannan izinin ne ko wani makamancinsa kawai.
trans-unit.note: See http://creativecommons.org/ to find out how this is normally translated in your language. What we're aiming for here is an easy to understand summary.

trans-unit.source: You may not make changes or build upon this work without permission.
trans-unit.target: Ba zai yiwu ka yi canje-canje ko ka yi ɗori akan wannan aikin ba tare da izini ba.
trans-unit.note: See http://creativecommons.org/ to find out how this is normally translated in your language. What we're aiming for here is an easy to understand summary.

trans-unit.source: You may not use this work for commercial purposes.
trans-unit.target: Wannan aiki ba domin a yi amfani da shi domin kasuwanci ba ne.
trans-unit.note: See http://creativecommons.org/ to find out how this is normally translated in your language. What we're aiming for here is an easy to understand summary.

trans-unit.source: For permission to reuse, contact the copyright holder.
trans-unit.target: Don izinin sake amfani da shi, ka tuntuɓi mai haƙƙin mallaka.
trans-unit.note: This is used when all we have is a copyright, no other license.

trans-unit.target: Ba wani izinin da aka bayyana

trans-unit.source: Allow commercial uses of your work?
trans-unit.target: An ba da izinin yin amfanin da shi domin kasuwanci?
Am bayar da izinin yin gyare-gyare a cikin aikinka?
Haƙƙin Mallaka da bayar da izini

trans-unit.source: Contact the copyright holder for any permissions
trans-unit.target: Ka tuntuɓi Mai haƙƙin Mallaka don neman izini

trans-unit.source: Yes, as long as others share alike
trans-unit.target: I, muddin manufarmu ta zama iri ɗaya ce

trans-unit.note: When you choose a Creative Commons License, this label shows over the text box at the bottom.
The meaning of "non-commercial" is vague but important. This hyperlink takes you somewhere tha defines it.

While this screen allows it, legally you can't enforce any additions to a creative commons license. This link takes you to the clause that says that. This link is visible only if you choose Creative Commons but then type in the "Additional Request" box.

trans-unit.source: This may also hide other buttons which are not needed by the non-advanced user.
trans-unit.target: Wannan zai iya ɓoye wasu madannai ma waɗanda basu ƙware ba domin ba su buƙatarsu.

trans-unit.source: The button will show up when you hold down the Ctrl and Shift keys together.
trans-unit.target: Madannai za su ta fito idan ka danna Ctrl da Shift tare.

trans-unit.source: Hide the button that opens settings.
trans-unit.target: Ɓoye madanni da ya ke bude wurin saitin tsare-tsare.

trans-unit.source: To prevent accidental changes which could cause this tool to stop working for you, these settings have been locked.
trans-unit.target: Don kiyaye faruwar canje-canjen da ba a buƙata waɗanda za su iya sa wannan manhajar da kake aiki da ita ta dena, an rufe wannan saitin.
Kalma ta Kariyar shiga Tsarin saiti

trans-unit.source: Factory password for these settings is "{0}". If you forget it, you can always google for "{1}" and "{2}".
trans-unit.target: Kalmar Izinin Shiga ta Kamfani don yin wannan saitin ita ce "{0}". Idan ka manta ta, a kodayaushe za ka iya shiga yanar gizon matambayi ba ya bata don "{1}" da "{2}"
trans-unit.note: Don't forget to have the {0}, {1} and {2} in your translated string!

trans-unit.source: Require the factory password to get into settings.
trans-unit.target: Nemi Kalmar Izinin Shiga ta Kamfani don yin saiti.
Tsarin saitin Kalmar Izinin Shiga ta Kariya

trans-unit.source: (The selected font is not available on this machine. Using default.)
trans-unit.target: (Ba harafin da ka zaba akan wannan na'urar, ta yin amfanida abun ta fito da shi tun asali.)

trans-unit.source: This is a &right to left writing system.
trans-unit.target: Wannan tsarin rubutun da ake farawa ne daga hannun dama zuwa hagu.

trans-unit.source: If the keyboard you need is not listed, click the appropriate link below to set it up
trans-unit.target: Idan ba a sa irin wurin latsa kalmomin rubutun da kake bukata ba, ka dangwala hanyar da tafi dacewa a ƙasa don yin saitin
Allon madannan da aka yi amfani da su

trans-unit.source: Keyman 5.0 or later is not Installed.
trans-unit.target: Ba a riga an sa Keyman 5.0 ko na gaba ba.

trans-unit.source: Select the &keyboard with which to type {0} text
trans-unit.target: Zaɓi Wurin kalmomin rubutu da za ka rubuta {0}

trans-unit.source: &Test Area (Use this area to type something to test out your keyboard.)
trans-unit.target: &Wurin Jarrabawa (Ka yi amfani da wannan wurin don rubuta wani abin da za ka jarraba allon madannanka.)

trans-unit.source: The application is unable to connect to the SIL Locale Data Repository to retrieve the latest information about this language. If you create this writing system, the default settings might be incorrect or out of date. Are you sure you want to create a new writing system?
trans-unit.target: Manhajar ta kasa haɗawa da gidan yanar gizon na ma'adanar SIL don samun sabon bayani game da wannan harshen. Idan ka ƙirƙiri wannan tsarin rubutu, saitin da na'ura ta fito da shi me yiwuwa ba daidai yake ba ko kuma ya ƙare aiki. Ka tabbata zaka sake ƙirƙirar wani tsarin rubutun?
